review: I love my chromecast! This lets me watch netflix, youtube, etc right on my TV without having to plug in a bunch of stuff. The picture looks excellent, the sound is excellent. I also have a Kindle Fire HD and I actually think it's even easier to use the chromecast with my kindle than my laptop. I can stream pandora music through my kindle right to my TV. There are some serious limitations to what you can cast to your TV, though - for instance, right now there is no way to stream pandora through a Chrome browser window on your laptop. And although you can cast an entire chrome browser tab to your TV, it is kind of sluggish and the sound isn't that great. But considering the chromecast is only $30, it is WELL worth it! Even if the only thing it did was cast netflix to your TV, it would be worth it! Love it.
author: Clairebear
